Package JEST.model.cards

package JEST.model.cards
This package contains all the classes linked to the cards in the game : A Card is a SuitCard or a JokerCard. An Offer is composed by 2 OfferCard who are face-up or face-down cards. The Deck is general or the rest of the cards unused in the last round. CardVisitor and ScoreVisitor permit the separation of data from a class's processing, access control. The Jest is the list of the cards that the player gets during the rounds.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    JEST
    This package contains the general classes of JEST: Game : this is the most important class of the game.
    JEST.model.cards.trophy
    This package contains all the trophies of the game : We have the interface Trophy which is implemented by the 6 classes for each trophy.
    JEST.model.virtualPlayer
    This package contains the three strategies possible for VirtualPlayer : We have the AgressiveStrategy, the DefensiveStrategy and the RandomStrategy.
  • Class
    Description
    Card
    This is a general card : we define the Trophy of the card, and declare abstract the methods to get the face value and the suit (we define them if it is a SuitCard.
    CardVisitor
    This interface allows access to the scores obtained by the SuitCards or the JokerCard.
    Deck
    This class defines the decks : we can shuffle it, fill it...
    DeckType
    This enum class permits to define the two types of Deck fixed by the design pattern Multiton : the general and the "restOfCards".
    Jest
    This class defines the list of Cards that the
    invalid reference 
    Player
    detains during all the game.
    JokerCard
    There is one joker among the cards.
    Offer
    In each round, each
    invalid reference 
    Player
    have to make an offer and choose an other one.
    OfferCard
    An offerCard is a Card in an offer.
    ScoreVisitor
    Compute the score of each Jest.
    Suit

    SuitCard
